targetAudience.title: Target audience
targetAudience.content: This site is planned for business owners, investors, entrepreneurs and those interested to learn more about local businesses in the Rosario area.

items: A remodeling company looking for networking opportunities.
A builder looking for land where to expand his developments.
A young entrepreneur looking for guidance how to start a business.
A marketing company looking for business-related data and demographics.
A current Chamber of Commerce member looking for news and events information.
scenarios.title: Scenarios
